# organizations settings set organization-sync

Organization sync settings to sync organization memberships from an IdP. This applies to all organizations.

Aliases:

- organizationsync
- org-sync
- orgsync

## Usage

```console
coder organizations settings set organization-sync
```

## Description

```console
Organization sync settings works across all organizations. The sync will automatically add members toorganizations based on the IdP claims. Deployment administrators can configure this sync.
```
